title: Low Priority Queue
body: I left a game last night, the first game i've left in 3 months and i got 5, 10 min low priority queue. For someone who has tried best to change (seen in my last 3 months of play) i find it saddening that you dont get lesser punishment for not leaving over time.

replies.body: The whole point of the system, to punish the people that leave, hence LEAVEBUSTER

That is good you can read. The point is i've left 1 game in 3 months and i got 5 match 10 min low priority queue. The fact there is no reset on your profile even when you made the effort not to leave, it is in quiet frankly shit and unfair scheme in which players are not rewarded for making an effort to change.It is a blatant 'forget' about the player attitude taken by league.
